edu.stanford.nlp.process

Class LexerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.process.LexerUtils

  • public class LexerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains various static utility methods invoked by our JFlex NL lexers. Having this utility code placed outside the lexers facilitates normal IDE code editing.
    Author:
    Christopher Manning

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeFractions

        public static java.lang.String normalizeFractions(boolean normalizeFractions,
                                                  boolean escapeForwardSlashAsterisk,
                                                  java.lang.String in)
        Change precomposed fraction characters to spelled out letter forms.
        Parameters:
        normalizeFractions - If false, do nothing; if true normalize to ASCII character sequence
        escapeForwardSlashAsterisk - If true also escape forward slash with backslash (deprecated historical PTB)
        in - The input string to normalize
        Returns:
        The normalized fraction string
